reviews.name: Ozark Trail 4-Piece Microfiber Sheet Set
reviews.reviewText: these sheets feel great I would highly recommend them
reviews.title: great sheets great price

reviews.name: Ozark Trail 4-Piece Microfiber Sheet Set
reviews.reviewText: I love these sheets. They wash great and stay on the mattress. They are a dream to sleep on. VERY reasonably priced.
reviews.title: Camo can be stylish and feel wonderful!!

reviews.name: Ozark Trail 4-Piece Microfiber Sheet Set
reviews.reviewText: These sheets are really soft and good looking. i thought they would be hot and uncomfy but they are really soft and not hot at all. also generously sized pillowcases and sheets. they will fit over a 1 or 2 inch egg carton mattress topper no problem. my mattress is 12" thick. . we really like these. i wish they had a matching blanket or quilt to go with it.
reviews.title: really nice!
